meanings.definition: The quality or state of being trim.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit displayed a lovely trimness that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The trimness of the garden showed the care the gardener put into it.
meanings.sent3: The trimness of the cake was so perfect, it looked almost too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: The trimness of his writing style made his stories flow effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The trimness of the ship's sails allowed it to glide smoothly through the water.

meanings.definition: The act of making something neat or orderly.
meanings.sent1: She took pride in the trimness of her desk, with everything in its place.
meanings.sent2: The trimness of the bookshelves made the whole room look more organized.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at achieving trimness in his closet organization ended up in chaos.
meanings.sent4: The trimness of the lines on the paper gave the drawing a polished look.
meanings.sent5: The trimness of the folded laundry made her feel accomplished.

meanings.definition: A state of being in good physical shape.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to exercise showed in the trimness of his physique.
meanings.sent2: The trimness of her figure was a result of regular workouts and a healthy diet.
meanings.sent3: The trimness of the athlete's body was envied by many.
meanings.sent4: The trimness of his muscles was a testament to his hard work at the gym.
meanings.sent5: The trimness of her waistline was a source of pride for her.
